verses.name: Jeremiah 31:4
verses.text: Again I will build thee, and thou shalt be built, O virgin of Israel: thou shalt again be adorned with thy tabrets, and shalt go forth in the dances of them that make merry.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:5
verses.text: Thou shalt yet plant vines upon the mountains of Samaria: the planters shall plant, and shall eat them as common things.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:6
verses.text: For there shall be a day, that the watchmen upon the mount Ephraim shall cry, Arise ye, and let us go up to Zion unto the Lord our God.
